definition: to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

pinyin: Ma3 ke4 si1 Lie4 ning2 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Its theory and practice have been codified in the canon of Leninism.
sentences.chinese: 它的理論和實踐都根據列寧主義原則進行彙編整理。

sentences.english: China may claim to be Marxist-Leninist, but it’s really market-Leninist.
sentences.chinese: 中國所奉行的馬列主義，實際上是市場列寧主義。

sentences.english: The doctrine of Leninism has developed Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 列寧主義學說發展了馬克思主義。

sentences.english: We must always hold on to the Marxist-Leninist principles.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須永遠堅持馬克思主義列寧主義原則。
